greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows A051731 * A130123, 1<=k<=n.
formula: Triangle read by rows A051731 * A130123, 1<=k<=n, where A130123 = an infinite lower triangular matrix with (1, 2, 4, 8, ...) in the main diagonal and the rest zeros. A051731 = the inverse Mobius transform.
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
program: (PARI) tabl(nn) = {ma = matrix(nn, nn, n, k, !(n%k)); mb = matrix(nn, nn, n, k, n--; k--; if (n==k, 2^n, 0)); m = ma*mb; for (n=1, nn, for (k=1, n, print1(m[n, k], ", ");); print(););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 30 2017
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Aug 14 2008
ext: Typo in data corrected by _Michel Marcus_, Jun 30 2017
